text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Low-level nuclear waste" means waste that:
Contains or is contaminated with radioactive material emitting primarily beta or gamma radiation; and
Is neither high-level nuclear waste nor transuranic waste.
"Transuranic waste" means waste material that is measured or assumed to contain at least 10 nanocuries of transuranic activity per gram of waste.
